positive_examples: This is an example of battleship.
We observed battleship in this context.
A typical case of battleship would involve these features.
The concept of battleship applies here.
A heavily armored and armed warship designed for naval combat with large-caliber guns.
negative_examples: This is an example of aircraft carrier, not battleship.
This represents military ship in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: AircraftCarrier, or other types of MilitaryShip

definition: A large heavily armored warship with powerful guns.
